question: What is the rank of India in the Environment Performance Index (EPI Index 2020), released by the Yale University?
explanation:
The 12th edition of the biennial Environment Performance Index (EPI Index 2020) has been released by the Yale University. 
In the index that measured the environmental performance of 180 countries, India secured 168th rank with a score of 27.6 out of 100. Last year, the country scored 30.57 and was placed at 177th rank. Denmark was placed at the first place, followed by Luxembourg and Switzerland. The United States was placed at 24th rank.
